src:
Hasil Pertandingan Real Madrid vs Galatasaray: Skor 6-0
07 Nov 2019, 04:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid sukses menghajar Galatasaray enam gol tanpa balas dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 yang digelar di Santiago Bernabeu, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Pemain muda Rodrygo menjadi bintang kemenangan Real Madrid dengan menciptakan tiga gol alias hat-trick plus satu assist. Karim Benzema turut menyumbang dua gol, sedangkan satu gol lainnya lahir lewat eksekusi penalti Sergio Ramos.
Berkat hasil ini, Real Madrid masih menempati peringkat dua klasemen Grup A dengan poin 7, sedangkan Galatasaray terpuruk di posisi juru kunci dengan poin 1.

Simak ulasan pertandingan selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Results of the match Real Madrid vs Galatasaray: Score 6-0
Nov 7 2019, 04:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid successfully beat Galatasaray six goals without reply in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group stage held at the Santiago Bernabeu on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
Young player Rodrygo became the star of Real Madrid's victory by creating three goals, aka hat-tricks plus one assist. Karim Benzema also contributed two goals, while one other goal was born through the execution of a penalty Sergio Ramos.
Thanks to these results, Real Madrid still ranks second in Group A with 7 points, while Galatasaray slumped in the position of caretaker with point 1.

Check out the full match review below.
